title: rAjagOpAla
sahitya:
rAjagOpAla dEvAdi dEvanE shrI


anupallavi

  shrI jagadIsha jagamellAm Inra shen kamala nAyaki maruvum maNavALa 


caraNam    dEvargaL paNindu enrum vashittiDum dakSiNa dvArakai enru pugazh perum
 pAvana campakAraNya pura vASa bAlagOpAla bhakta manO hamsa nin sEvai oru
 taramE sheidAl janma vinaiyarumE ena Aval koNDunadu sannidhi vandadAl
 AdarittALum rAmadAsan paNindiDum
